mapper.insert: insert into review (userID, userNickname, movieCd,movieNm, rate, content,imgUrl) values(#{userID},#{userNickname},#{movieCd},#{movieNm},#{rate},#{content},#{imgUrl})
mapper.select: select userNickname, movieCD, movieNm, rate, content,imgUrl from review where movieCd = #{movieCd}

SELECT m.movieCd,m.movieNm,m.titleEng,m.openDt,m.genre,m.posterUrl,m.prodYear,m.directorNm,m.actorNm,m.company,m.rating,m.vodUrl,m.vodClass,f.state,u.userID, FROM movie m LEFT JOIN favorite f ON m.movieCd = f.movieCd LEFT JOIN user u ON f.userID = u.userID WHERE m.movieCd = #{movieCd};
mapper.insert: insert into favorite (movieCd, userID, movieNm, rate,imgUrl) values(#{movieCd},#{userID},#{movieNm},#{rate},#{imgUrl})
mapper.update: UPDATE favorite SET state = CASE WHEN state = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE userID = #{userID} AND movieCd = #{movieCd}
mapper.select: select * from favorite where movieCd = #{movieCd} and userID=#{userID}
mapper.delete: delete from favorite where movieCd = #{movieCd} and userID=#{userID}
